pullrequest.title: Final changes to make Atlas v4 & v5 stand and walk

content.raw:
It is mostly working for me. Some notes:

* Reset world is not working, which is probably expected
* Some errors from the ColladaLoader

```
[Err] [ColladaLoader.cc:1670] Collada file[/home/jrivero/code/ws/drcsim/install/share/atlas_description/meshes_unplugged/utorso.dae] is invalid. Loading what we can...
```

* Warnings from the AtlasSimInterface

```
 [AtlasSimInterface] [] Unable to find config value man.psi_supply_label
 [AtlasSimInterface] Could not find config entry man.psi_supply_label when looking for object requested by Atlas3.man`
```

* While using the keyboar teleop, some errors appear:

```
[AtlasSimInterface] Atlas3Step_walk.cpp,populate_step_path,198 did not get all the steps I asked for
 [AtlasSimInterface] 	Step(2) asked for 5 and got 4
 [AtlasSimInterface] 	Path Server: user_path_server
 [AtlasSimInterface] 	Trying to find (     3 [AtlasSimInterface] ,    4 [AtlasSimInterface] ,    5 [AtlasSimInterface] ,    6 [AtlasSimInterface] )
 [AtlasSimInterface] 	API Queue has  (     2 [AtlasSimInterface] ,    3 [AtlasSimInterface] ,    4 [AtlasSimInterface] ,    5 [AtlasSimInterface] )
 [AtlasSimInterface] Atlas3Step_walk.cpp,populate_step_path,198 did not get all the steps I asked for
```

I can see it walking when I use the keyboard teleop, but on every step forward (pressing i) I see the robot doing a step backwards and making a step forward again and at the end, the robot position is only a bit forward than the initial pose.
content.html:
It is mostly working for me. Some notes:

  • Reset world is not working, which is probably expected
  • Some errors from the ColladaLoader
[Err] [ColladaLoader.cc:1670] Collada file[/home/jrivero/code/ws/drcsim/install/share/atlas_description/meshes_unplugged/utorso.dae] is invalid. Loading what we can...
  • Warnings from the AtlasSimInterface
 [AtlasSimInterface] [] Unable to find config value man.psi_supply_label
 [AtlasSimInterface] Could not find config entry man.psi_supply_label when looking for object requested by Atlas3.man`
  • While using the keyboar teleop, some errors appear:
[AtlasSimInterface] Atlas3Step_walk.cpp,populate_step_path,198 did not get all the steps I asked for
 [AtlasSimInterface]    Step(2) asked for 5 and got 4
 [AtlasSimInterface]    Path Server: user_path_server
 [AtlasSimInterface]    Trying to find (     3 [AtlasSimInterface] ,    4 [AtlasSimInterface] ,    5 [AtlasSimInterface] ,    6 [AtlasSimInterface] )
 [AtlasSimInterface]    API Queue has  (     2 [AtlasSimInterface] ,    3 [AtlasSimInterface] ,    4 [AtlasSimInterface] ,    5 [AtlasSimInterface] )
 [AtlasSimInterface] Atlas3Step_walk.cpp,populate_step_path,198 did not get all the steps I asked for

I can see it walking when I use the keyboard teleop, but on every step forward (pressing i) I see the robot doing a step backwards and making a step forward again and at the end, the robot position is only a bit forward than the initial pose.
